title: Lily Collins publicly flirts with new boyfriend Charlie McDowell on Instagram
text:
She confirmed her romance with her director boyfriend back in August.

And Lily Collins showed her romance with Charlie McDowell was going from strength to strength as she publicly flirted with him on Instagram on Sunday.

The Love, Rosie star, 30, posted a series of beautiful snaps showing her twirling around in the stunning settings of The Palace of Versailles - with a smitten Charlie unable to contain his admiration.

Romance: Lily Collins showed her romance with Charlie McDowell was going from strength to strength as she publicly flirted with him on Instagram on Sunday (pictured last month)

The star, who is currently in the middle of shooting TV series Emily in Paris, wrote: 'Twirling my way through the end of the week and enjoying the set between scenes last night...' with Charlie,36, responding 'it was magic.'

A besotted Lily responded: 'You're magic', with the comment liked by almost 200 people.

Lily confirmed her romance in August by posting a snap of Charlie on her Instagram account when he flew out to the French capital to visit her on the set of Emily In Paris.

She captioned the shot: 'When he's only just left but it feels like forever... Miss you already'.

Flirty: A besotted Lily responded: 'You're magic', to a comment by Charlie on her latest post with the comment liked by almost 200 people

The screen star is the latest in a long line of A-List partners for Charlie, who directed The One I Love and The Discovery.

The LA-born filmmaker has dated several high-profile actresses, including Emilia Clarke, 32, Hilary Duff, 31, and Rooney Mara, 34.

Charlie was in a relationship with Hilary for three months between September and December 2007.

The director then had a serious romance with Rooney for over six years from 2010, which came to an end in September 2016.

PDA: Lily confirmed her romance in August by posting a snap of Charlie on her Instagram account when he flew out to the French capital to visit her on the set of Emily In Paris

Charlie and Game Of Thrones star Emilia confirmed they were dating in October 2018, but the relationship fizzled out.

Lily has also had her fair share of headline-grabbing relationships, including a brief romance with her Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil, and Vile co-star Zac Efron, 31, in 2012.

The brunette had an on/off romance with British actor Jamie Campbell Bower, 30, for five years after meeting on the set of The Mortal Instruments, but the pair called it quits for good in 2018.

Lily and Charlie both have famous parents in common; Lily's dad is musician Phil Collins while Charlie is the son of actor Malcolm McDowell and actress Mary Steenburgen.

Famous family: Lily is the daughter of legendary musician Phil Collins (pictured 2012)
